source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_00<tab>Some of Ponnixia's friends have been enjoying more than their fair share of milkroot.
target: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_00<tab>シルフの仮宿のポニシアは、酔っぱらいをこらしめたいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_01<tab>A pack of sylphs under the influence of particularly potent milkroot is wreaking havoc in Little Solace. Deliver them a solid beating on Ponnixia's behalf, topped off with a splash of spring water to rouse them from their drunken stupor.
target: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_01<tab>ポニシアの依頼を受けた。シルフの仮宿周辺の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E91B401 /var>」で周囲を見渡し、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090801 /var>」を打ち負かして「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E891D01 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_02<tab>The tipsy sylphs have been dealt with, returning peace to Little Solace. Inform Ponnixia that the deed is done.
target: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2090801 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E891D01 /var>を使った。シルフの仮宿の「ポニシア」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_03<tab>Ponnixia expresses her thanks for your efforts, along with a hope that her people will learn that milkroot is best enjoyed in moderation.
target: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SEQ_03<tab>ポニシアは冒険者を労った。極上ミルクルートは刺激が強すぎるようだ……。またの機会に協力しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_TODO_00<tab>Search Little Solace for tipsy sylphs, and splash water on them after weakening them.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_TODO_00で見渡し、現れたを打ち倒して
を使う

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_000<tab>As if this one didn't have enough trouble with touched ones! Some of these ones enjoy milkroot and dreamslime a little too much, and are making a mess of these ones' home!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_000わたぴらの仲間が、酔っ払って大暴れちてるのでふっち！
きっと、「ドリームトードのガマ油」に漬け込んだ、
極上ミルクルートを噛み噛みしたからでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_001<tab>Tipsy ones will not listen to this one, but will listen to a good bashing and splashing─this one knows. Walking one will help, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_001ちょっと、こらしめてほしいのでふっち！
「」を弱らせてから、
この「」をぶっかけるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_002<tab>Tipsy ones stagger and stumble around Little Solace in drunken stupor. If walking one hears strange babbling and smells strange stink, that means tipsy one is just around the corner!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_002は、仮宿の周囲をさまよってるでふっち。
が暴れてた場所で、周囲を見渡せば、
向こうから近付いてくるはずでふっち。

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_005<tab>Friendly one must find tipsy ones, give tipsy ones good bashing and splashing!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_005「」を弱らせてから、
この「」をぶっかけるのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_006<tab>If walking one hears strange babbling and smells strange stink, that means tipsy one is just around the corner!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_006「」は、シルフの仮宿の周辺で暴れてるふっち。
気配を感じる場所でしばらく待ってれば、
きっと、姿をあらわすはずでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SYLPHENEMY_000_010<tab>That'sh the best─hic!─milkroot thish one's ever had.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SYLPHENEMY_000_010うひゃぁ！
チベタイでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SYLPHENEMY_000_011<tab>Thish one'sh a mossy one! Mossy one comin'─hic!─through!
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SYLPHENEMY_000_011はっ！　ここはどこ？
わたぴは誰でふっち？

TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_SYLPHENEMY_000_012お、おええ～っ
キモチワルイでふっち…

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_020<tab>This one has no end of gratitude for friendly one. This one hopes tipsy ones have learned a lesson: too much milkroot makes crazy one out of any one.
target:
TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_PONNIXIA_000_020ごくろうさまなのでふっち！
わたぴの漬け込んだ極上ミルクルート……
やっぱり、トーシロには刺激が強すぎたのでふっち！

source: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>A half-crazed sylph staggers drunkenly in your direction!

target: TEXT_BANSYL204_01270_POP_MESSAGE_000_000<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
